author: David Bauer / AP
title: Let’s Make a Deal, The Price Is Right Viewership Surges as Americans Stay Home Amid Coronavirus
description: Instead of watching their own finances crater, shut-in TV viewers tuned in to the game show “Let's Make a Deal” in record numbers last week.
content:
(NEW YORK) — Instead of watching their own finances crater, shut-in television viewers tuned in to the game show “Let’s Make a Deal” in record numbers last week.
TV programs across the dial recorded superlatives last week with a captive audience of millions … [+3272 chars]
